short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: save & enter to your last locations in specified sites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MarkUption will let you to go back to your last location in a specified sites!
you won't have to mark your last location in chrome every time you want to save a new location.
you can just mark your site and whenever you will want to go back to your last loaction you can just click on the extension and choose the site you marked!

it's that easy!
